programme.title: Hearts Beat Loud
programme.desc: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

programme.title: Justin Bieber's Believe
programme.desc: Experience Justin Bieber's real story in this compelling documentary featuring thrilling never-before-seen concert footage, behind-the-scenes access and special appearances.

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Rock 'N' Roll High School
programme.desc: A group of rock-music-loving students, with the help of the Ramones, take over their school to combat its newly installed oppressive administration.

programme.title: Half Nelson
programme.desc: A powerful, award-winning film about an inner-city junior high school teacher (Ryan Gosling, The Notebook) with a drug habit who forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students (Shareeka Epps) after she discovers his secret.

programme.title: I'm Charlie Walker
programme.desc: The true story of how one desperate man, armed with only his charm and wits, takes on a racist San Francisco corporation in 1971.

programme.title: The Poker House
programme.desc: A dramatization of Lori Petty's teenage years spent in small town Iowa.

programme.title: 99 Homes
programme.desc: A recently unemployed single father struggles to get back his foreclosed home by working for the real estate broker who is the source of his frustration.

programme.title: Good Fences
programme.desc: An African American attorney moves his family into the posh, white world of Connecticut with provocative results.
